snippet: Rick Santorum declared that "conservatism is alive and well in Missouri and Minnesota" Tuesday night as he gloated about his twin victories over Mitt Romney in the ongoing presidential contest.
abstract: Rick Santorum declared that "conservatism is alive and well in Missouri and Minnesota" Tuesday night as he gloated about his twin victories over Mitt Romney in the ongoing presidential contest.

headline.main: Santorum Claims Victory for Conservatism After Twin Wins
